Text.Page:
The poison's run its course. I'm still a little woozy, but I'll be fine.

Tell Anwold I still have work to do here, so I'm not coming back yet. Don't worryâ€”I'll be careful this time. Done talking.
Good to hear Animan's alive and well. The little furball's lucky you were there. He may not get so lucky next time.
